resources.string: Connect your Instagram professional account with Boost 360
Create your Instagram account. Or log in if you already have one.
Logged in to your Instagram account?
Connect your Facebook page with Instagram

Your Instagram page is initially a personal account. To start posting your business updates via Boost 360, you need to convert it to a professional account. From Instagram go to Settings ➜ Switch to Professional Account.
Next, set up two-factor authentication. In your Instagram account go to Settings ➜ Security ➜ Two-factor Authentication. Tap on Get Started and Enable Text Message.
Linking your Instagram page to Facebook makes it easier to operate your social media accounts. To connect, open your Facebook page and go to Settings ➜ Instagram ➜ Connect to Instagram.

Connected Facebook with Instagram?

If yes, then just tap on ‘Authorise Boost 360’ button below to allow Boost 360 to access & sync your instagram account info, post updates on your behalf and read related channel insights.
Congratulations, Boost 360 is successfully connected to your Instagram account %1$s
All your business updates will be auto-posted on your Instagram account.
Need help? Contact support for assistance.
Looks like the process has not been completed properly. You will not be able to integrate Boost 360 with Instagram if you do not complete the previous steps.
